1.verse: The elder to the chosen lady and her children, whom I love in truth— and not only I, but also all the ones having known the truth—

2.verse: because-of  the truth abiding in us. And it will be with us forever.

3.verse: Grace, mercy, peace from God the Father, and from Jesus Christ the Son of the Father, will be with us in truth and love.

4.verse: I Rejoiced To Find You Walking In The Truth. Be Loving One Another - I rejoiced greatly that I have found some of your children walking in the truth, just as we received commandment from the Father.

5.verse: And now I ask you, lady— not as-if writing you a new commandment, but the one which we had from the beginning— that we be loving one another.

6.verse: And this is love: that we be walking according to His commandments. This is the commandment, just as you all heard from the beginning, that you should be walking in it.

7.verse: Because There Are Many Deceivers. Watch Out, And Abide In The Teaching of Christ - Because many deceivers went-out into the world— the ones not confessing Jesus Christ as coming in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the antichrist.

8.verse: Be watching yourselves in order that you may not lose the things which we accomplished, but may receive a full reward.

9.verse: Everyone going-ahead and not abiding in the teaching of Christ does not have God; the one abiding in the teaching— this one has both the Father and the Son.

10.verse: If anyone comes to you and does not bring this teaching, do not receive him into the house and do not speak greetings to him.

11.verse: For the one speaking greetings to him shares in his evil works.

12.verse: Having many things to write to you all, I did not want to do so with paper and ink. But I hope to come-to-be with you and to speak mouth to mouth, in order that our joy may be full.

13.verse: The children of your chosen sister greet you.
